text: Thomas William Tucker (born July 15, 1945) is an American mathematician, the Charles Hetherington Professor of Mathematics at Colgate University,Faculty web page, retrieved 2014-10-29. and an expert in the area of topological graph theory.J. L. Gross and T. W. Tucker, Topological Graph Theory, Wiley Interscience, 1987 Tucker did his undergraduate studies at Harvard University, graduating in 1967, and obtained his Ph.D. from Dartmouth College in 1971, under the supervision of Edward Martin Brown. Tucker's father, Albert W. Tucker, was also a professional mathematician, and his brother, Alan Tucker, and son, Thomas J. Tucker, are also professional mathematicians. ==References== Category:20th-century American mathematicians Category:21st- century American mathematicians Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Dartmouth College alumni Category:Colgate University faculty Category:Graph theorists Category:Living people Category:1945 births Category:Mathematicians from New York (state)
